snippet: Dr. Schultz, an infectious disease epidemiologist, detected a cluster of pneumonia cases that proved “the opening salvo for the AIDS epidemic,” he later recalled.
abstract: Dr Myron G Schultz, infectious disease epidemiologist whose work helped public health officials identify AIDS epidemic, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Schultz, an infectious disease epidemiologist, detected a cluster of pneumonia cases that proved “the opening salvo for the AIDS epidemic,” he later recalled.

headline.main: Dr. Myron G. Schultz, Who Helped Identify AIDS Crisis, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Dr. Myron G. Schultz, 81; Helped Identify AIDS Crisis

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
